contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 22, 1998 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Championship Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-championship-section
Entertainments Contest
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist Ian Williams (cornet) Cory. Best trombone - Chris Thomas (Tredegar). Prizes - 1st £150, 2nd £90, 3rd £60. 6 bands competed.
Oct. 21, 2010, 4:47 p.m. July 2, 2020, 2:09 p.m.
1 Cory Band Jeremy Wise
2 Tredegar Town Band Philip Bailey
3 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Alan Gibbs
4 Cwmaman Institute Silver (Tower Colliery) Band Stan Lippeatt
5 Tongwynlais Temperance Band Adrian Morton
6 Parc and Dare Band M. Farrow
